TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_mabalatay_a_banges_malawpesay_a_imelang, title = mabalatay_a_banges_malawpesay_a_imelang, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/mabalatay_a_banges_malawpesay_a_imelang} }

S.FORM: mabalatay a banges malawpesay a imelang : . . , . . mabalatay a banges malawpesay a imelang: ilabuay nu mabalatay nu hecian malahul a adada. nu sipaw malahul a nipatahekalan tu ci hun su', micumud i idaidangan mila'cus tu buwa', sisa malibuwa' ku tademaw huming sa tu. u adada nina mabalatay a banges malawpesay a imelang, pasu adada nu hecihecian, muta' atu malawmaw ku balucu', anu pihaceng satu nu namakaydaay i nikaaddaan nu banges atu malibuwaay nu adada hakiya. ina imelangay a tademaw hakiya idaw ku kalalumenian nu sumanah nu kulitan a mahida u ti'kuk kasalengac nu isian atu caay kaicelang ku balucu. , , , , , , . . . 1,000 U L 5,000 U L. nikaduka ninaheci satabakiay nu namakayda namini i hekalay, mahida u nipacician a kawaw, malakuuyt ku nipinanam, sapayu atu pakalaluwayluway sa mukan, dumatu a nikaadadaan pasumalalid, maala nu dingki, mabayu', samuhmuh sa caay piyundu, caay ka taneng ku idang atu nikalatan nu bau. idaw ku siaulan a tademaw, sisa hinaadada ku hecihecian sa imelang satu. mabalatay a banges malawpesay a imelang hina sipakayda i isi' a mikinsa atu i sen wi cin mikinsa, anu nu isi'an anikinsaan tu tatipeluk u yen sin nika itini i sen wi cin nai' ku sumanahay a idawng nu malian, hakiya aw u mabalatay a banges malawpesay a imelang. sipakayda i idang maadih ku ci suen ci mei tadapihaceng ku lupenac mikikaka tu 1000 U L , anu pahaceng hakiya mikikaka tu 5000 U L. ina imelang atu nika imelang . . , , . mabalatay a banges malawpesay a imelang a nina imelang namakayda i pihaceng atu nai' nu icelang nu buwa'an a nikatahekalan. anu caay ka pihaceng nai' ku hicahica nu adada nu hecian, sisa u nuduma kiya a wendayan kanca a kinsaan ku idang kiya katinengan. u tatengaay a mabalatay a banges malawpesay a imelang kanca tahekal ku nikaadada nu hecian, penecen adada', nai' ku icelang atu balebawa. . . anu amelik ku nikalebawa, u idang amelik tayda i kikan micumud i madukaay a hecian sa, alaw a maselep ku idang atu mabulilah, mahiniay a kawaw alaw a namakayda i imelangay a tademaw, sipakayda i maluyuhay a lumaan a patahekal. nu dumaan a imelangan nai' ku hicahica a waywayan, alaw han u nikakelacan nu heci nika dukaan nu hecian a nikatahekalan. , , , . 12 24 . nikadukaan nu heci anpatahekalan micumud i idaidangan, mala caay kalecad ku tin cea ce, sisa mangalay muli',muta', caay ka tineng tu tademaw, mabulilah atu malawlaw ku balucu', ina imelangay a tademaw u isi' nida hakiya idaw ku ci hun su tunika lumeni', itini i nakamuan nu misaydan u "uciyaan a kulitan nu isi'an". nika kukaan nu buwaan hina tida i heci tu mahkamaduka nu nikuda tu sabaw tusa katuku tu tusa a lasubu idaw ku sepat a tatukian a tahekal, hakiya mawada ku aisian atu inai' ku aisian nu imelangay a tademaw. . . (DIC) . nikadukaan nikalebawaan nu hecian alahican a mapatideng ku baluwangay a adadaan, nu sakalecaday nu le muo cen mapenec katukuh i liklik a hikan atu singkicu a nikapulungan, miketun tu nipacumudan tu idang sisa maduka atu nai' ku'ken. nikaadadaan nu baluwan a adadaan pasuukaukakan mawada' a tapalan atu adada'. mabuliyas ku idang masaluimeng ku culil nu idang u dumaan a hinaadih kita tu mahiniay a nikapulungan nu imelang, palusaimeng tu nipacumudan tu idnag tunikapihaceng nu adadaan ahicanen caay tu kapud ku nikatahekalan nu idangan.
